properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 11 at 3:34AM CST until February 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE AREA LATE
TONIGHT THROUGH EARLY THURSDAY MORNING...

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flash Flood Watch for portions of southeast Arkansas and
northwest Mississippi, including the following areas in
southeast Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot. In northwest
Mississippi, Bolivar, Sunflower and Washington.

* From this evening through Wednesday evening

* An additional 2 to 3 inches of rainfall in a short amount of
time is expected.

* Areas of flash flooding are likely. Numerous roads may be
flooded and possibly closed. Structures will be threatened with
inundation. Moderate river flooding is also possible.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should flash flood warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
